action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,

Thanks for this - looks great! Just a few tweaks before we go live on global:

  1. Can we have the lines sit BELOW the answers once the arrow is clicked

  1. Can we please reorder some of these 'Learn more' links to sit under their corresponding answers/paragraphs, and have them link to the following:



FilaSorb: https://acoufelt.com/au/filasorb/

QuietBack: https://acoufelt.com/au/barrierback

BarrierBack: https://acoufelt.com/au/barrierback

(And corresponding global links for the global site)



Thanks heaps!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman

Marketing Manager
